About

Fung Lok is an authentic Chinese & Vietnamese Restaurant which sets a calm and quiet atmosphere well suited for business meetings or for a casual meal.

The atmosphere is welcoming and friendly in which you are able to relax and enjoy a delicious meal in a Chinese & Vietnamese background.

The decor pays homage to the ethnic Chinese background yet holds a balance with modern Western design.

The small vibrant blue bar adds to the modern design with its Chinese beers and Western beverages.

The staff are more than happy to help you have a relaxing and enjoyable experience when dining.

There are lunch specials available when eating in which allows for a casual dine for a cheaper price.

There is a fine selection of wine, spirits and other alcoholic and non-alcoholic beverages to compliment the hearty Asian food.

The restaurant is vegetarian-friendly with its dedicated wide selection of vegetarian starters and mains.

The restaurant is also child-friendly with a children's menu available when eating in and there are plentiful amounts of high chairs for small children.

Tables are usually available without much wait but if you would like to make sure you have a table ready for you immediately, please make reservations by contacting us.

Contact & Location
